ygData.subject: Re: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: I did not say that I had to cheat to have fun with EQ.  I have lots of fun and haven t taken advantage of any of the cheats that this list has provided.  I
ygData.messageBody:
I did not say that I had to cheat to have fun with EQ. I have lots of fun
and haven't taken advantage of any of the "cheats" that this list has
provided. I use the guest info, but I don't trap monsters or anything.
From Diablo I was one of the ppl that made it to level 50 with no cheats,
and only items that I found so I knew they were legit. I also had a
hacked-to-heck character on Diablo b/c sometimes I think it's fun to run
around and kill anything ya darn well please.

if I had to cheat to have fun I wouldn't play EQ.

Omeg

please note lack of flames.


>It's players like you that make me sick. Why the hell bother playing this
>game, if you need to cheat at it to have fun. Go bother someone else's
>game.
>
>Macabre
